name: Story of a Schizophrenic
description:
A top-down stealth game about NOT stealing.

You play as a schizophrenic guy who wakes up in a new place every night, you have no idea how you got in, but all you know is you need to get out without getting caught!
But you have another personality, which steals everything he can grab! and everything weighs atleast a bit which will slow you down.

GOAL:

Get out of the building without being spotted. The exit is an open WINDOW.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
